hero.title: Crafting reliable experiences with a human touch
hero.description: I design, ship, and maintain digital products that balance delightful interfaces with resilient architecture.
hero.secondary: Currently safeguarding mission-critical systems and building new capabilities at Asince SRL.
about.subtitle: Story
about.title: From support engineer to full-stack problem solver
about.description: Hi! I'm Federico Moretto, a developer who loves transforming complex ideas into simple, maintainable products.
At Asince SRL I combine incident response with product delivery: I investigate tickets, release hotfixes, and push new features while keeping performance on track.
My background in foreign trade sharpened my analytical mindset and my ability to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams.
about.highlightsTitle: What teammates rely on me for
about.highlights: Diagnosing and resolving production incidents before they impact users.
Designing automations that shorten support cycles and reduce manual tasks.
Delivering UI enhancements that respect accessibility and brand guidelines.
Monitoring infrastructure health across cloud services and databases.
about.focusAreas: AI-assisted tooling to accelerate debugging and support workflows.
Design systems that keep multi-language products consistent.
Cloud-native observability and incident response strategies.
Scalable APIs with .NET, and serverless runtimes.
skills.subtitle: Toolkit
skills.title: Skills & technologies
skills.description: Passionate about backend development — turning logic and data into reliable, high-performance solutions.
skills.highlights: Set up CI pipelines and automated quality gates to keep releases predictable.
Champion component-driven development with reusable patterns and accessibility-first thinking.
Pair with stakeholders to translate business rules into maintainable features.
works.subtitle: Career
works.title: Recent roles & collaborations
works.description: Highlights from the teams I've partnered with and the outcomes we achieved together.

works.items.summary: I keep the core platform stable while delivering roadmap features for fintech and ERP products.
achievements: Management and resolution of technical support tickets.
Development and implementation of hotfixes for production issues.
Monitoring and maintenance of servers and databases.
Development of new features for web applications.

works.items.summary: Delivered bespoke web experiences for small businesses, from concept to production hand-off.
achievements: Built responsive websites and PWAs that increased lead generation for local clients.
Automated back-office workflows with Firebase, reducing manual effort by up to 50%.
Mentored non-technical stakeholders to adopt analytics and iterative testing.
